website_summaries.verdict: Provides health benefits to diets that are already vitamin-rich.
pros: We love that some side effects include softer, glowing skin
Customers report of a myriad of benefits that include improving the effects of anti-inflammatory drugs to helping heal from a new tattoo
Made in USA at FDA cGMP registered facility
Available in bottles of 90 or 180 capsules
cons: Be mindful of effects if taking other supplements

customer_reviews.title: Get It. It Works
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my Golden Years consequently I bruise easily and puncture my skin without even being aware of it at the time. My wife said get vitamin K that's what her Dad took when he had the same problem. I am glad to say it works. I've only been taking K for a couple of weeks and my skin is tougher and more resilient. I love it when something actually works. Can't hurt that it also toughens up your bones.
customer_reviews.author: Turk  Richpel

customer_reviews.title: Improved Eye Sight Inmediatly
customer_reviews.text: Received and start taking it... Improved my eyesight inmediatly! I do not know why...but it did! Thank you for your great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario E

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Some anti-inflammatory products, like aspirin and the herb turmeric, cause hemorrhagia (bleeding) or bruising, but this Vitamin K supplement stops these unwanted side effects. I found it very helpful for nosebleeds and would easily recommend it for those seeking a product for blood clotting.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: This may be helping.
customer_reviews.text: As a youth, I at times had a vitamin K deficiency (excessive bleeding; no clotting) requiring vitamin K shots. Lately (not a youth anymore, but in my 70s) I developed a bleeding and bruising problem, so I started taking vitamin K. Also learned it is recommended for arthritis as well. The results are not dramatic; however, they do seem to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: I take every day this vitamin has helped my skin it doesn't tear easily any more and no bruising due to this vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Took post tattoo and this vitamin helped me heal within a week after 2 weeks I was completely healed. I take every day this vitamin has helped my skin it doesn't tear easily any more and no bruising due to this vitamin. I would suggest it to anyone who want to improve their skin
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: Helps bones and teeth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my bones and I've also noticed that my teeth look whiter. I love getting an added bonus with a product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Question recommended dosage
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered, there was no description of the mg. amount. Ordered anywya. We i received it, the mg. amount was about 4-5 times what my research suggested. The email to the company bounced back, so i’ve Not been able to ask them about it. So I take one every 3 days.....for now. Still need some time to call the manufacturer and see what is up with their suggested daily dosage of 550 Vit K, 400 Vit K2 and 50 of a different Vit K2. Other recommended dosages are in the 120 daily range.....unless I totally do not understand something.
customer_reviews.author: Lin H. Fryman

customer_reviews.title: I have had no bad side affects so far
customer_reviews.text: Im taking this because it is recommended by a doctor for restoring bone strength in osteoporosis suffers, along with weight baring exercises and a good health diet with certain foods. I was concerned this may give me side affects, but it has not so far. I'm glad. So I will continue to take it. I won't know about my bones for a year thou. Next dexa test. I will do my best and have faith the Lord is helping me. He cares.
customer_reviews.author: Vickies Place

customer_reviews.title: not a good formulation for me
customer_reviews.text: it sounds good, if some k2 is good, try more k. Problem is this pill is about 4X too much for one day, plus it is heavy on k1 which has bad side effects such as skin redness and itching. Too much is too much. No.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I live a ketogenic lifestyle so sometimes I would have bruising out of nowhere and it would last weeks for each one. My legs would be covered with bruises, very embarrassing. Since I started taking this about a month ago, not only did my bruises disappear within a week, I no longer bruise at all anymore. I've always bruised easily so this is pretty refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Maddux

customer_reviews.title: So far so good,
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact it's all natural, not to mention people don't really give Vitamin K a thought however when reading about it we need it, and with controversial debates on our food industry / THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION, and real efforts on the part of insuring healthy, naturally healthy food, including vitamins and supplements is failing. I received my order quickly thank you, do to the fact it's a vitamin I can't really make any comments yet about the products long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Lambchop60

customer_reviews.title: I like that I'm getting 3 in 1.
customer_reviews.text: In regard to vitamins, which are hard to review, I would say that Bronson is one of the fairest priced in relation to the quantity. I've been taking Vit. K 2 for quite a while but this is the first time I've taken three forms of it in one capsule. They're easy to swallow and I've had no adverse reactions.

I burped up sulfur tasting burps, and threw up twice while taking it for a few days. Would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Excess vitamin K can lead to toxicity & liver damage
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this specific brand has 3 different forms of vitamin K. It's the only brand I could find with all forms. However, vitamin K is a fat-soluble vitamin; taking an excess amount of it can lead to toxicity & liver damage. This product has 700% of the daily recommended dose. That's a bit overkill. Supplements aren't FDA regulated so make sure you do your homework as a consumer to evaluate their safety.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT ON SEVERE BRUISING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered over 20 years with hand and arm bruising...just a little bump, and I had a black bruise! It was so humiliating. My Dr. told me I had thin skin....uggghhh I searched for years for an answer to my problem. I have tried creams, ointments and lots of supplements and nothing has worked. I ordered this product and have been taking it for 3 weeks. My bruising is much better already!! I still bruise, but they vanish in days NOT WEEKS!! Hopefully after several weeks I won't bruise as easy. This product has improved my life and will continue taking it. Thank you for a wonderful product!!!

customer_reviews.title: Made with Soy
customer_reviews.text: Normally all K2 made from soy has it posted on the bottle and the website. I called the company and was told this was made from soy and also that it is not NON GMO SOY. So I will have to return it. I liked that it included M4 and K1 in addition to K2-7 so sad to have to return this. Allergic to Soy and prefer K2-7 made from chic peas.

product_meta.title: Vitamin K Triple Play (Vitamin K2 MK7 / Vitamin K2 MK4 / Vitamin K1) Full Spectrum Complex Vitamin K Supplement, 180 Capsules
feature_bullets: FULL SPECTRUM COMPLEX VITAMIN K SUPPLEMENT: Provides both Vitamin K1 and two forms of Vitamin K2, Vitamin K2 MK4 (Menatetrenone-4) and Vitamin K2 MK7 (Menaquinone-7).
NON-GMO, GLUTEN-FREE & SOY-FREE: We use only the best ingredients available. Manufactured at cGMP certified facility. Laboratory tested.
BONE & HEART HEALTH: Formulated to help build strong bones and healthy heart.* Vitamin K2 keeps calcium out of your arterial lining, preventing calcification of coronary arteries*

TRUSTED SINCE 1960: The pioneers of Bronson Vitamins were a group of pharmacists who witnessed the benefits of vitamins and mineral supplementation firsthand with their patients. Bronson Vitamins have been consistently mentioned by top medical professionals since our inception in 1960.
1 YEAR SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We back our products up with a 365-day hassle-free money back guarantee. There's no risk when you order now!
